statements: DELETE FROM geofence_alerts WHERE id = 1;
DELETE FROM geofence_alerts WHERE geofence_type = 'entry';
DELETE FROM geofence_alerts WHERE id = 1 OR user_id = 5;

DELETE FROM geofence_alerts WHERE alert_id = 100 AND user_id = 50;
